Call for contributions

We are looking for contributions for the EnhanceR Symposium from a range of areas relevant to our community:

  • Show-and-tell sessions: Share software you developed, a specific project, tool or technique. These are 30 Minute sessions including Q&A and discussions.
  • Workshops: Lead a hands-on session or facilitate a discussion on a topic, 45 or 90 minute sessions.

Examples for workshops include, but are not limited to:

  • Hands-on sessions focusing on specific techniques (e.g., advanced Git workflows).
  • Effective data management strategies and techniques.
  • Implementing best practices for reproducible, ethical, inclusive, and collaborative data science and research, following principles like those championed by "The Turing Way".
  • Strategies for scaling up RSE initiatives within Switzerland.
  • Project management methodologies tailored for research software projects.
  • Navigating the role and challenges of an RSE.

Would you like to help shape the EnhanceR Symposium? Please submit your idea using the form by June 8th 2025.
